data.actual_result: After successfully sending a friend request, everything stay on screen so you can keep pushing the Send button to spam-send the same friend request. This also forces you to manually clear the textfield if you want to input another user
data.expected_result: The old Add Friends modal used to close after successfully sending a friend request. In this new screen I believe it is supposed to either close or at least clear the contents of the textfield
data.short_description: [Add Friends screen] Nothing is cleared after successfully sending a friend request
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Friends tab and open Add Friends screen - Input a valid Discord Tag - Press Send
